title: YTPTube Scheduled Tasks
description: Schema describing recurring download tasks stored in tasks.json.

name.description: Human-friendly task label used throughout the UI.

url.description: Playlist or channel URL monitored by the task.

folder.description: Optional download folder override for this task.

preset.description: Preset name to apply; falls back to the global default when omitted.

timer.description: Cron expression executed by the scheduler (five or six space-separated fields).

template.description: Output filename template override for downloads created by this task.

cli.description: Additional yt-dlp arguments appended to the download request.

auto_start.description: Automatically queue new items discovered by the task.

handler_enabled.description: Controls whether the matched handler remains enabled for this task.
